titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning the covenant and baptism dialogue-wise, between a Baptist & a Poedo-Baptist wherein is shewed, that believers only are the spirituall seed of Abraham, fully discovering the fallacy of the argument drawn from the birth priviledge : with some animadversions upon a book intituled Infant-baptism from heaven and not of men, defending the practise of baptizing only believers against the exceptions of M. Whiston / by Edward Hutchinson.
titleStmt.author: Hutchinson, E. M. (Edward Moss)

notesStmt.note: Errata: p. 108 in the middle and p. [16] at the end.
Includes publisher's list: p. [15]-[16] at the end.
Imperfect: pages 4-9 of second page count faded with some loss of print; pages 2-19 from defective Union Theological Seminary Library, New York copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
